# TOP Development LLC

> TOP Development LLC is a software development company founded in 2025, offering end-to-end development services including web, mobile, backend, SEO, infrastructure modernization, and technical consultation.

Website: https://thatoneprogrammer.dev
Contact: austinalex@thatoneprogrammer.dev
Location: Pittsburgh, PA, United States

## Services

### Web Development
Build powerful, responsive web applications. Includes custom React & React Native applications, mobile-friendly web pages, e-commerce solutions, content management systems, API integration, and responsive design.

### Mobile Development
Native and cross-platform mobile experiences. Includes iOS & Android development, React Native applications, cross-platform solutions, app store deployment, push notifications, and offline functionality.

### Backend Development
Robust and scalable server-side solutions. Includes RESTful API development, Spring Boot framework, database design & optimization, microservices architecture, real-time data processing, and authentication & authorization.

### SEO Services
Increase visibility and drive organic traffic. Includes technical SEO audit, keyword research & strategy, on-page optimization, performance optimization, schema markup implementation, and analytics & reporting.

### Infrastructure Modernization
Upgrade and optimize your technology stack. Includes AWS supported infrastructure, DevOps & CI/CD pipeline, auto-scaling infrastructure, load balancing & CDN, security & compliance, and disaster recovery planning.

### Consultation Services
Expert guidance for your technology decisions. Includes technology stack selection, architecture design review, code quality assessment, scalability planning, security audit, and strategic roadmap planning.

## Why Choose TOP Development

- **AI-Powered Speed**: Leverage cutting-edge AI tools to build and deploy faster than traditional methods
- **Quality Assurance**: Rigorous testing and quality control ensure reliable, production-ready solutions
- **Scalable Solutions**: Built to grow with your business, from startup to enterprise scale
